articles.title: Strauss’ ‘Blue Danube’ is beamed into space as Vienna celebrates with a concert - AP News
articles.description: Strauss' “Blue Danube” waltz has finally made it into space, nearly a half-century after missing a ride on NASA's Voyagers. The European Space Agency's big radio antenna in Spain beamed the waltz into the cosmos Saturday. Operators aimed the antenna at Voyage…
articles.content:
VIENNA (AP) Strauss Blue Danube waltz has finally made it into space, nearly a half-century after missing a ride on NASAs twin Voyager spacecraft.
